name: Birth of America 2: Wars in America 1750-1815
name_original: Birth of America 2: Wars in America 1750-1815
description:
Birth of America 2: Wars in America 1750-1815 is a strategy game developed by Ageod. It came out on 07-08-2008. AGEod published the game.
Birth of America 2: Wars in America 1750-1815 is available on PC.
